description: Positive integers n such that 2^n == -3 (mod n).
comments: No other terms below 10^16.Larger term: 18468744643735483963902321985787 [From Max Alekseyev]
mathematica: Do[ If[ PowerMod[ 2, n, n ] + 3 == n, Print[n]], { n, 1, 10^9, 2 } ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
extensions: Corrected and extended by Olivier Wittenberg, May 23 2004.
